parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the resource. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which you want to add the instance.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource. For example, if you set ResourceType to instance, set this parameter to the ID of the instance.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the ECS resource. Valid values:

*   instance: instance
*   disk: Elastic Block Storage (EBS) device
*   snapshot: snapshot
*   image: image
*   securitygroup: security group
*   ddh: dedicated host
*   ddhcluster: dedicated host cluster
*   eni: ENI
*   keypair: SSH key pair
*   launchtemplate: launch template

These values are case-sensitive.
